name: Architect Stories
description:
A feel-good audiovisual experience that’s easy to pick up and play for anyone! Think “building legos + I Spy books + ASMR.” What is it?

Architect Stories is a casual house-building game that combines satisfying point-and-click assembly and soothing storytelling. Construct each house piece-by-piece as you’re guided by narrative-driven voiceovers from the fictional architects who designed them. 

What Makes It Fun? 🥰Wholesome, Carefree Gameplay

Architect Stories is an accessible game that rewards you with instantly gratifying mechanics, visuals, and audio that’ll put a smile on your face.

🤤Ear-Tickling Voice Talent

Every level is narrated by the fictional architects who designed each house you’ll build. Enjoy the unique storytelling style and soothing tones of professional voice actors.

🤩Low-Poly Eye Candy

Feast your eyes on cute, toy-like house models illuminated by vividly realistic lighting.  

Development Progress

This build is a vertical slice demo that features one level and represents all major mechanics of the game. The final game is planned to have at least 10 different house models to build, and more planned for future expansions!

Overall PC Version Completion: 60%

  • Game Mechanics: 100%
  • Music & SFX: 75%
  • Level Design: 20%

Estimated time to completion of PC build: 4 months

Enjoy Architect Stories!
